articles.title: Jennifer O'Connell: Sole weapon to beat coronavirus is our safe togetherness

articles.title: Coronavirus crisis: Harris dismisses Green Party’s call for national unity government
articles.description: Stable government must be formed to deal with Covid-19 crisis, says Simon Harris
articles.content:
Minister for Health Simon Harris has said that a stable government with a workable majority must be formed in order to deal with the coronavirus crisis and economic fallout.
